name: Rainbow Preschool Center
description: Kai Ming curriculum aligns with the Head Start Early Learning Outcomes Framework (ELOF) and California early care and education standards. The curriculum is drawn from current child development science, the interests and ideas of the children, family input, and the values of the community. The curriculum fosters development in areas including physical, social, emotional, language and literacy development, as well as problem-solving and cognitive skills. howToGetIt: Visit their enrollment pages in English, Chinese, or Spanish or call the main office to schedule an in-person or virtual appointment.
cost: This is a fee based service.
